Description:
Detects executables launched from external WebDAV shares using the WebDAV Explorer integration, commonly seen in initial access campaigns.


Author: Ahmed Farouk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious External WebDAV Execution
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (((c-useragent like 'microsoft-webdav-miniredir/%' and cs-method = 'get') and (c-uri like '%.7z' or c-uri like '%.bat' or c-uri like '%.dat' or c-uri like '%.cmd' or c-uri like '%.exe' or c-uri like '%.js' or c-uri like '%.lnk' or c-uri like '%.ps1' or c-uri like '%.rar' or c-uri like '%.url' or c-uri like '%.vbe' or c-uri like '%.vbs' or c-uri like '%.zip')) and  not (dst_ip cidr '127.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '10.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '172.16.0.0/12' or dst_ip cidr '192.168.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '169.254.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '::1/128' or dst_ip cidr 'fe80::/10' or dst_ip cidr 'fc00::/7'))
